name: Arturo Fuente - Rare Pink Vintage 1960's - Short Story
additionalNotes: The Arturo Fuente Rare Pink cigar brand was created to help raise breast cancer awareness, a project that is very dear to Liana Fuente who is in charge of brand development for Arturo Fuente cigar company, and she is the daughter of Carlos Fuente Jr. Proceeds from the purchase of each box will be donated to The American Cancer Societyâ€”Making Strides Against Breast Cancer. The cigar features an Ecuadorian wrapper with a binder and filler composed of premium tobaccos from Nicaragua and undisclosed origins. The cigars are handmade at the famed Tabacalera Fuente in the Dominican Republic.
